name: Vibe IT!
description:
Vibe IT! is Axe Mayhem and Ghostface..? wtf is he doing here? what does Ghostface have to do with anything? idk man he's just there. You got 45 secs to kill everyone until the map resets. This is in beta and more maps and kill count, SFX, and more will b added to the game. It is a neon-styled game with Ghostface (if it isn't obvious) in it. it is local multiplayer, meaning you can only play with ppl on the same internet.

What's New?; added Death SFX, 2 New Maps, Made Jump Height Higher.

LOCAL MULTIPLAYER ONLY!

WASD - Movement.

Space - Jump.

LMB - Swing Axe.

Q - Dance.

E - Wave.

F - Point.

ESC - Close Game
